title: David's Delicatessen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One-half coffee shop and one-half lunch deli. Unlike traditional American delis, this place offers sandwiches with around 50% the rotating menu items being vegetarian and at least one sandwich is vegan. Has organic non-GMO soy milk for the espresso drinks. Hipster ambiance with free Wi-Fi and a ping pong table in back.
